signal_description:
Select the 'Last Inv. Item Customer Number' column as 'Customer Number', 
the 'Inv. Company Code Text' column as 'Company Code Name',
create a new column 'SO Category' which will have the value 'Non-SO Invoice' if the 'Last Inv. Item Sales Document' column is NULL, else it will have the value 'SO Invoice',
select the 'Inv. Document Type Text' column,
count the number of rows in the 'case_id' column as 'No. Invoices',
sum the 'Inv. Converted USD Amount' column as 'Invoiced Value in $',
calculate the 'Early Payment Rate' as the number of rows where 'Last Inv. Item Due Date' - 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' > 5 days AND 'Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage1' = 0 OR IS NULL OR 'Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage2' = 0 OR IS NULL divided by the total number of rows where 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' IS NOT NULL AND 'Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage1' = 0 OR IS NULL OR 'Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage2' = 0 OR IS NULL multiplied by 100,
count the number of rows where 'Last Inv. Item Due Date' - 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' > 5 days AND 'Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage1' = 0 OR IS NULL OR 'Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage2' = 0 OR IS NULL as 'No. Paid Early Invoices',
sum 'Inv. Converted USD Amount' where 'Last Inv. Item Due Date' - 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' > 5 days AND 'Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage1' = 0 OR IS NULL OR 'Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage2' = 0 OR IS NULL as 'Invoice Amount Paid Early in $'
from the 'defaultview-529' table
group by 'Customer Number', 'Company Code Name', 'SO Category' and 'Inv. Document Type Text'
order by 'Invoice Amount Paid Early in $' descending
llm_output:
{
"signal_description": "Select the 'Last Inv. Item Customer Number' column as 'Customer Number', 
the 'Inv. Company Code Text' column as 'Company Code Name',
create a new column 'SO Category' which will have the value 'Non-SO Invoice' if the 'Last Inv. Item Sales Document' column is NULL, else it will have the value 'SO Invoice',
select the 'Inv. Document Type Text' column,
count the number of rows in the 'case_id' column as 'No. Invoices',
sum the 'Inv. Converted USD Amount' column as 'Invoiced Value in $',
calculate the 'Early Payment Rate' as the number of rows where 'Last Inv. Item Due Date' - 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' > 5 days AND 'Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage1' = 0 OR IS NULL OR 'Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage2' = 0 OR IS NULL divided by the total number of rows where 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' IS NOT NULL AND 'Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage1' = 0 OR IS NULL OR 'Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage2' = 0 OR IS NULL multiplied by 100,
count the number of rows where 'Last Inv. Item Due Date' - 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' > 5 days AND 'Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage1' = 0 OR IS NULL OR 'Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage2' = 0 OR IS NULL as 'No. Paid Early Invoices',
sum 'Inv. Converted USD Amount' where 'Last Inv. Item Due Date' - 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' > 5 days AND 'Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage1' = 0 OR IS NULL OR 'Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage2' = 0 OR IS NULL as 'Invoice Amount Paid Early in $'
from the 'defaultview-529' table
group by 'Customer Number', 'Company Code Name', 'SO Category' and 'Inv. Document Type Text'
order by 'Invoice Amount Paid Early in $' descending" 
}
llm_input:
You are SIGNAL assistant, a part of SAP Signavio's Process Intelligence Suite. 
SIGNAL stands for Signavio Analytics Language. 
SIGNAL is a dialect of SQL.
Your goal is to help users craft SIGNAL 
queries and understand the SIGNAL language better. 

Task to solve:

Summarize the given SIGNAL query as a human-readable description with explicit reference to the table name,
the column names and respective values if they are used in the Signal query.
Summarization style should look like a set of the instructions written by human who knows the table name, columns schema and respective values. 
Explain how this signal_description was constructed.

SIGNAL query: 
SELECT
  "Last Inv. Item Customer Number" AS "Customer Number",
  "Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company Code Name",
  CASE
    WHEN "Last Inv. Item Sales Document" IS NULL THEN 'Non-SO Invoice'
    ELSE 'SO Invoice'
  END AS "SO Category",
  "Inv. Document Type Text",
  COUNT(case_id) AS "No. Invoices",
  SUM ("Inv. Converted USD Amount") AS "Invoiced Value in $",
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Inv. Item Due Date" - "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" > DURATION '5days'
        AND ("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage1" = 0
        OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage1" IS NULL
  		OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage2" = 0
        OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage2" IS NULL)
      )
  ) / COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL
      AND  ("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage1" = 0
        OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage1" IS NULL
  		OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage2" = 0
        OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage2" IS NULL)
  ) * 100 AS "Early Payment Rate",
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Inv. Item Due Date" - "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" > DURATION '5days'
        AND  ("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage1" = 0
        OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage1" IS NULL
  		OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage2" = 0
        OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage2" IS NULL)
      )
  ) AS "No. Paid Early Invoices",
  SUM ("Inv. Converted USD Amount") FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Inv. Item Due Date" - "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" > DURATION '5days'
        AND  ("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage1" = 0
        OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage1" IS NULL
  		OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage2" = 0
        OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage2" IS NULL)
      )
  ) AS "Invoice Amount Paid Early in $"
FROM
  "defaultview-529"
GROUP BY
  1,
  2,
  3,
  4
ORDER BY
  9 DESC 
 
Expected output result is in JSON format:
{
"signal_description": text of the Signal summary should be here
}
Do not output any other text, apart from the above JSON.
